<script>
  var e1 = {{Click Element}}
  var classes = e1.className;
  if(classes && classes.includes("add_to_cart_button")){
  //do something
    var value = localStorage.getItem("add_to_cart_count");
    if(value) {
    value = parseInt(value);
      value = value + 1;
    }else {
      value = 1;
    }
    localStorage.setItem("add_to_cart_count", value);
    var cartLevel = "NA";
    if(value>4){
    cartLevel = "max";
    }else {
    cartLevel = "yes";
    }
  }
</script>

<script>
  var cats = ["Accessories", "Hoodies", "Tshirts"];
  var cat = {{DOM - fetch - catagerry}};
  var value = localStorage.getItem(cat);
  var accessoriesAffinity = "NA";
  var hoodiesAffinity = "NA";
  var tshirtsAffinity = "NA"
  if(value){
    value = parseInt(value) + 1;
  }else {
    value = 1
  }
  localStorage.setItem(cat, value);
  for( var i = 0; i< cats.length; i++){
  var times = localStorage.getItem(cats[i]);
    if(times && parseInt(times) >= {{MAX - users favourite number}}){
      if(i===0){
       accessoriesAffinity = cats[i]; 
      }
      if(i===1){
        hoodiesAffinity = cats[i]
      }
      if(i===2){
        tshirtsAffinity = cats[i]
      }
  }
  }
</script>
